title: Molecular characteristics of organic matter derived from sulfonated biochar
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00233D, Paper
Zhengfeng Jiang, Chen He, Fei Gao, Quan Shi, Yang Chen, Haimeng Yu, Zhimao Zhou, Ruoxin Wang
The CHOS- and CHONS-containing formulae are predominant in SBC-DOM, while DOMs from RH, PYC, and HYC are dominated by CHO-containing formulae.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
